hudson.model.TextParameterValue.name: RELEASENOTE
hudson.model.TextParameterValue.description: ビルド内容がわかるリリースノートを記入してください
hudson.model.TextParameterValue.value: 本番全部ビルドのテスト

hudson.model.BooleanParameterValue.name: CLEAR_CACHE
hudson.model.BooleanParameterValue.description: Libraryフォルダーを削除してビルド（注意：ビルド時間が１時間ほど増えます。）

org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.name: ワークスペースのクリーン

org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value:
StringBuilder commandBuilder = new StringBuilder() commandBuilder.append "$UNITY_PATH" commandBuilder.append " -projectPath $WORKSPACE" commandBuilder.append " -quit -batchmode" commandBuilder.append " -executeMethod $ADDRESSABLE_METHOD" commandBuilder.append " -logFile ${WORKSPACE}/Logs/assetbuild_${BUILD_ID}_log.txt" commandBuilder.append " -buildTarget $BUILD_TARGET" commandBuilder.append " -assetProfile P3${BUILD_KIND}"
sh(script:commandBuilder.toString(), returnStdout:false)

org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.name: バージョン情報の取得

org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value: def APP_OUTPUT_PATH = "./$OUTPUT_PATH/${PRODUCT_NAME}.apk" def version_script = $/eval "aapt2 dump badging ${APP_OUTPUT_PATH} | grep 'versionName' | sed -e 's/.*versionName=//' -e 's/ .*//'"/$ VERSION = sh(script:"${version_script}", returnStdout:true) VERSION = VERSION.replaceAll("'", "") echo "version=${VERSION}"

flow-build.description: ブランチ：release GITLOG：Author:辛 東根 Message:Merge branch 'features/20220614_fix_layer_motion' into 'release' Date:2022/06/20 17:05:33
